verses.name: John 9:26
verses.text: Then said they to him again, What did he to thee? how opened he thine eyes?

verses.name: John 9:27
verses.text: He answered them, I have told you already, and ye did not hear: wherefore would ye hear it again? will ye also be his disciples?

verses.name: John 9:28
verses.text: Then they reviled him, and said, Thou art his disciple; but we are Moses’ disciples.

verses.name: John 9:29
verses.text: We know that God spake unto Moses: as for this fellow, we know not from whence he is.
